m_szDocTitle: Patent US20110079166 - Multi-modal transportation system for solar electric vehicle - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Abstract A useful system for our transportation needs must be in concert with the ecological and economical needs of the future. The vehicle concept considers all the constrains imposed by battery materials, oil and electric energy availability and production capacity, electric grid power capability and will make transportation cheaper faster and more robust than the current system. The multi-feature vehicle is modular in design separating and placing optimally the functional modules so that many variations are easily possible allowing the range, carrying capac
